titleStmt.title: William Lilly student in astrologie, his past and present opinion touching monarchy in these nations: and his decision of the controversie between the Normans and the Long-Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

notesStmt.note: Refers to predictions made in Lilly's: Monarchy or no monarchy in England .. 1651.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
